This month, we are participating in One School, One Book. Each student went home yesterday with the book "The World According To Humphrey", by Betty Birney. To kick off the month, we had a community meeting where Humphrey came to life and told the students about Hamsters. Each day, our real live Hampster will visit a homeroom classroom. The class will write in a journal and talk about the adventures Humphrey will be having in their classroom for the day.

So far, Humphrey has been a hit and the students are enjoying the book. Even a few reluctant readers have enjoyed reading the first chapter. Stay tuned as we share about Humphrey and his experience at school.
